meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The grindelia in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of grindelia for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the grindelia.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a field of grindelia.
meanings.sent5: The scent of grindelia filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A resin obtained from the grindelia plant, used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The herbalist used grindelia in the remedy.
meanings.sent2: I bought a jar of grindelia resin for my cough.
meanings.sent3: The cat sneezed after sniffing the grindelia resin.
meanings.sent4: The grindelia resin soothed her throat like magic.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of grindelia resin calmed her nerves instantly.
